00070 class VVLayer 
00071 {
00072 
00073         protected:
00075                 VVNeuron * perceptrons;
00077                 long int vvneuronnumbers;
00078         public:
00084                 void vvlayerinit(long int a)    
00085                 {
00086                         vvneuronnumbers=a;
00087                         perceptrons = new VVNeuron [a];
00088                 }
00095                 void vvlayeruninit()
00096                 {
00097                         
00098                         delete [] perceptrons;
00099                 }
00100 
00105                 long int vvlayer_number_neuron()
00106                 {
00107                         return vvneuronnumbers;
00108                 }
00109                 
00114                 void vvlayer_bias_perceprton(int index,double val)
00115                 {
00116                         perceptrons[index].vvbias_weight=val;
00117                 }
00118 
00123                 void vvset_perceptron(int index,double val)
00124                 {
00125                         perceptrons[index].vvstate=val;
00126                 }
00127 
00132                 double vvget_perceptron(int index)
00133                 {
00134                         return(perceptrons[index].vvstate);
00135                 }
00136

00142                 {
00143                         return (perceptrons[index].vvbias_weight);
00144                 }
00145

00154                 }
